THE LATEST

Find out what's happening at Labour Nexus

Everything you need to know about Progressive Britain, the latest Labour faction

Labour has a new faction, Progressive Britain, launched at an online conference at ten o’clock this morning.

May 16, 2021 | Blogs

Labour: What do we all have in common?

Let’s clear out the insipid buzzwords that every party claims, put the values that we all share front and centre, and let’s take them into the next election as a united party with a clear vision.

April 14, 2021 | Blogs

Should Labour be pro business? - A breakdown on the issue.

In recent weeks, there has been much debate over Keir Starmer’s ‘pro-business’ stance. Here, the arguments for and against such a stance will be discussed.

April 05, 2021 | Issues

What barriers do young people feel there are to getting involved with Young Labour?

In a workshop, we discussed why Labour-supporting young people, including Young Labour members who are not very active in the party and its networks, do not get more involved.

April 02, 2021 | Blogs

The Nexus between our party is broken. Let's fix it.

Toxic, divided parties do not win elections. Instead, they discourage participation and lose the trust of the public.

It’s up to us if we want to end the blaming and the cynicism and unite the party to win.

About Our Movement

2019 General Election Results



Our Aims

🌹
UNITY

Oppose factionalism and encourage unity, co-operative and constructive debate, and co-operation between the various traditions and groups in the Labour Party;

🙏
A SAFE SPACE

Provide a safe, welcoming and non-factional space for members of the Labour Party, with a focus on but not limited to young members, to get involved with the wider labour movement and its networks and develop their political awareness and ideas;

✊
ACTIVISM

Encourage inactive and new members to get involved with the Labour Party’s networks, and encourage Labour supporters to join the Party and its networks;

✨
HOPE

Support the Labour Party’s electoral campaigns as a parallel campaigning force.

Read the Constitution

SUPPORT OUR CAUSE - WE CANNOT DO THIS WITHOUT YOU

Bringing Labour together will not be easy, but with the help of Labour members like you, we will be one step ahead.
